prism_pt_laio_forcing_prep module¶

Script to extract REW hydrologic forcing data from PRISM precip, mean temp, and tdmean data for use in the Priestley-Taylor ET model. Data is generated for use vadose zone models of the type developed in Laio et al. 2009.

The lat/long of each REW centroid is used to fetch the value at each gridpoint of the climate forcing surface.

prism_pt_laio_forcing_prep.get_rad(rew_dfs_dict, parent_dir)[source]¶
prism_pt_laio_forcing_prep.get_rew_elevations(basins, parent_dir)[source]¶
prism_pt_laio_forcing_prep.get_rew_pressures(rew_elevations)[source]¶
prism_pt_laio_forcing_prep.get_rh(tmean, tdmean)[source]¶
prism_pt_laio_forcing_prep.main()[source]¶

Extract hydrologic forcing data.

Script to extract REW hydrologic forcing data from PRISM precip, mean temp, and tdmean data for use in the Priestley-Taylor ET model. Data is generated for vadose zone models of the type developed in Laio et al. 2009.

The lat/long of each REW centroid is used to fetch the value at each generatedridpoint of the climate forcing surface.

Dataframe columns include:

  • None
Returns:
  • None
